name: Roll Table: Wall of Warped Time
description: The wall tangles the personal timestream of anyone that moves through it, causing one of the randomly determined effects below. A creature can attempt a Fortitude save against most of the effects, with a success negating detrimental effects or enhancing beneficial effects. Once a creature has passed through the wall, they are not subject to additional effects from moving through the wall additional times, whether they succeeded at the saving throw or not.

results.text: Gains the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.PecEOjojT15BJKi9]{Haste} until the end of their next turn. The duration increases by [[/r 1d4]] rounds with a successful Fortitude save.
Gains the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.4prroV3z26u1cy5y]{Slow} for [[/r 1d4]] rounds (Fortitude negates).
Gains the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.LoRydw1D4bqlbkA2]{Nauseated} condition for [[/r 1d4]] rounds (Fortitude negates).

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralyzed} for [[/r 1d4]] rounds immediately after passing through the wall (Fortitude negates). At the end of each of its turns, the creature can attempt a new Fort save, ending the effect if it succeeds.
